name: Luck Thief
description:
Entering the Saloon you noticed a mysterious old man promising  A Huge amount of money for anyone to beat him in a game of dice. The game seems simple, he roll a dice and you have to guess what it is. But the old man is VERY lucky. He wasn't defeated once. 

To beat him you NEED to build up you luck! You can do that by killing people in other towns to steal their luck. 

The more luck you have the better your chance of winning against the old man.

You lucks also helps you against enemies making you a hard target.

 

Controls:

move: WASD

shoot: mouse left button

interact: E

toggle fullscreen: F11
